channel.title: ExtraLabs Software News
channel.description:
Founded in 2002, ExtraLabs Software is a dynamically expanding software development company, focused on producing NET software for home and corporate users. We build our success on the talent and experience of our developers and ideas of our clients who inspire and guide our work in bringing to life powerful capabilities and innovative software tools.

Our products

item.title: Free RSS to HTML Script Released!
item.description:
New Product Released: Feed2Html PHP Script 1.0 Free!

Free script that converts data from RSS feeds to HTML code. Publish your news both at RSS and Web pages easily!

Download

item.title: Feed Editor 3.6 Released!
item.description:
A new version of Feed Editor has been released. Now with iTunes support!

 

You don't need to be a computer science guru and learn Internet technologies. Our editor makes work with RSS feeds maximally simple.

Read more

Download
item.author: dmitry@extralabs.net

item.title: Feed Mix 4.3 Released!
item.description:
A new version of Feed Mix has been released.

 

Feed Mix is a feature-rich RSS editor with the unique ability to create a new RSS feed from several others that already exist.

Read more

Download

item.title: RSS Wizard 2.55 Released!
item.description:
A new version of RSS Wizard has been released.

 

Do you want to create RSS feeds dynamically with ease? RSS Wizard makes it possible!

Read more

Download

item.title: Super Discounts: only in April
item.description:
50% OFF!!! Only in April.

You can register our products either Online, or by using one of the alternative ordering methods, such as Phone, Mail, via Fax, Purchase Order, PayPal, by Check, Cash, or Bank/Wire transfer.

Registering gives you ability to absolutely free of charge software updates. Also nag-screen will be removed and locked features will be available.

Read more

item.title: ExtraLabs Software: Support
item.description: Extralabs Software is looking for feedback from users. If you use RSS and need some tools for making your work more efficient then fill in the form an press 'Send'! We'll try to write the program you need!
